name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven QA Engineer with over 10 years of experience in testing methodologies and automation within financial platforms and AI/ML systems. Proficient in **Python**, **Golang**, and **JavaScript** for test automation and API testing, leveraging **Google Cloud** services for effective cloud-based solutions. Expertise in QA methodologies including functional, regression, and integration testing, as well as using defect tracking tools and performing load and stress testing to ensure high-quality software delivery. Strong interpersonal and time management skills, experienced in Agile and SCRUM environments, and committed to delivering comprehensive quality assurance throughout the SDLC. Proven history of impactful contributions at leading firms like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Conducted thorough **functional testing** and **regression testing** leveraging **Python** and **Golang** to ensure high-quality deliverables.
Implemented **test automation** frameworks using **JavaScript** and **Typescript** to enhance testing efficiency by **30%**.
Utilized defect tracking tools to streamline the identification and resolution of issues, achieving a **20%** reduction in critical defects.
Collaborated in an **Agile** environment, adhering to **SCRUM** methodologies to effectively manage project timelines and deliverables.
Participated in **API testing** to validate interfaces and ensure seamless integration between services, using **Postman** and **CURL**.
Engaged in continuous improvement initiatives by conducting **load testing** and **stress testing** on applications, implementing findings to optimize scalability.
Facilitated training sessions to enhance team members' understanding of **QA methodologies** and software development lifecycle (**SDLC**), improving overall performance.
Coordinated with the development team to develop and maintain CLI tools for automated testing, contributing to a **25%** increase in test coverage.

Implemented test automation strategies to enhance the quality assurance process, ensuring the reliability of backend systems developed in **Python** and **FastAPI**.
Executed functional testing and regression testing for event-driven microservices built with **Celery** and **Redis**, improving processing speed by over **30%**.
Utilized defect tracking tools to manage issues effectively during the software development life cycle (SDLC), achieving a defect resolution rate of **95%**.
Conducted integration testing for microservices deployed on **Azure App Services**, facilitating a seamless deployment process with **99%** uptime.
Managed API testing and load testing for data pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, optimizing data flow and reducing latency by **25%**.
Applied QA methodologies within an Agile environment using **SCRUM**, fostering collaboration with cross-functional teams for successful release management and adherence to regulatory compliance.
Demonstrated strong time management and interpersonal skills, leading QA efforts for projects involving **Google Cloud** deployments and various CLI tools.

Utilized **Python**, **Golang**, and **JavaScript** to develop and enhance backend services for trade execution and portfolio management, ensuring alignment with QA methodologies.
Executed comprehensive **API testing** and integration testing, ensuring high-quality software delivery with **90%** test coverage across multiple services.
Implemented automated test suites using **PyTest** and **tox**, reducing manual testing time by **40%** and accelerating the overall Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
Utilized defect tracking tools and logging tools to identify, analyze, and resolve issues, contributing to a bug resolution rate of **95%** within development iterations.
Applied **Agile** methodologies and participated in **SCRUM** meetings for effective time management and prioritization of QA tasks, enhancing team collaboration.
Engineered and maintained integration for real-time price feed processors with **WebSockets**, ensuring optimized performance for high-frequency trading operations.
Conducted thorough functional, regression, and load testing with specific focus on applications backed by **PostgreSQL** and **Redis**, ensuring reliability and compliance with regulatory standards including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**.
Introduced job scheduling solutions using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution times and enhancing overall system responsiveness.
